Articles.Content: Just like how today's probes fly by planets and snap pictures to transmit back to earth, I think cameras would be a great idea for KSP. Camera parts would of course be in the science tab and when used on missions, it rewards science points. They'd be most useful in the earlier stages of a career, where you don't have the necessary resources to send manned missions to other worlds and have to rely on probes/rovers to get to Duna and so on.

Welcome to the forums, Tebok.

I've moved the thread to the more appropriate Suggestions section.

we have a few mods that have camera parts and some that reward with science, also telescopes. but implementing it into the stock game for early stages is a really good idea. You get a better feeling for the advancements of technology.

But then we need building that get these pictures or Tracking Station will have button that show newly taked pictures and every time you get farther then kerbin pictures quality get less but if you have better antenna pictures will be better

also welcome to the forum have a good time
